Question: Some commentators noted this person's resilience throughout his career, in particular with regards to his presidential campaign.
Hints: This person's relative success came as a considerable shock on two fronts.
In 1981, six months after the divorce from Jackie (Battley) this person was final, this person wed Marianne Ginther.
On May 11, 2011, this person officially announced his intention to seek the GOP nomination in 2012.
